Pre-Game Insights: Guy Bruhn's Pick: Take New York (-143)
Miscellaneous Highlights: The New York Yankees hold a slugging % of.436 and they earn 5.07 runs per contest (2nd in MLB).
The Kansas City Royals have accounted for 247 two-baggers as a squad and have hit 160 balls out of the stadium.
The Yankees have tallied 215 HRs on the season as well as 701 RBIs.
The New York pitching staff have given up 602 runs for the year while having an ERA of 3.80 (543 earned runs conceded).
The Royals have accrued a K/BB ratio of 2.80 and their pitching staff has earned a collective WHIP of 1.26.
The Yankees have earned a strikeout to walk ratio of 9.00 (1,280 strikeouts against 473 bases on balls).
Others: The game will be played at Yankee Stadium in Bronx, NY on Wednesday, September 11, 2024.
The moneyline on this matchup has Kansas City at +120 while New York is sitting at -143.
The betting total is set at 8.5.
The pitchers who are expected to start are Cole Ragans and Luis Gil.
